revised_title: In Memoriam: Celebrating the Lives and Contributions of Notable Fellows
tldr: The President of the Royal Society, Sir Charles Sherrington, pays tribute to the notable scientists who passed away in the past year. These individuals made significant contributions to various fields of science, including chemistry, physics, biology, and medicine. Their lives and work are celebrated and remembered in this address.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies
